title: One PIE Fits All
body_text:
Ever So "Sweet" Main Event!
Months of boiling anticipation have been brewing for this one! Finally, legendary female superstars
Pamela D'Luhy
and
Alison Bertsch
settle their differences
CREAMation
style! It's the first whipped-cream filled massacre in four months!
And He Still Acts Like 4!
The ginormous main attraction coupled with the 24th birthday celebration for the iconic John Tronolone could only force your attendance even more! Will "The Writer's" closest ally have anything up his sleeve?
I Hear Ya Loud and Clear!
As if this 157th spectacle couldn't get any sweeter, literally, figuratively it will. "The Writer" is forewarning everyone of an earth-shaking announcement regarding the Season 16 Finale, DODGEBALL 160, scheduled for October 18! Just wait until you hear this!
DODGEBALL 157 comes to live from the hallowed grounds of Wall High School, September 27, beginning at 7:15pm!
body_html:
Ever So "Sweet" Main Event!
Months of boiling anticipation have been brewing for this one! Finally, legendary female superstars Pamela D'Luhy and Alison Bertsch settle their differences CREAMation style! It's the first whipped-cream filled massacre in four months!

And He Still Acts Like 4!
The ginormous main attraction coupled with the 24th birthday celebration for the iconic John Tronolone could only force your attendance even more! Will "The Writer's" closest ally have anything up his sleeve?

I Hear Ya Loud and Clear!
As if this 157th spectacle couldn't get any sweeter, literally, figuratively it will. "The Writer" is forewarning everyone of an earth-shaking announcement regarding the Season 16 Finale, DODGEBALL 160, scheduled for October 18! Just wait until you hear this!


DODGEBALL 157 comes to live from the hallowed grounds of Wall High School, September 27, beginning at 7:15pm!
